message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $1100000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid $950000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1025000. This is my best and final offer for this round.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit below your last offer. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $900000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but $900000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $975000. This is my final offer for this round.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $850000. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm offering the product to you for $900000. This is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
